title: Authors and Citation

title: Authors and Citation
text: Aden-Buie G (2023). lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text. https://github.com/gadenbuie/lorem, http://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/lorem/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text},   author = {Garrick Aden-Buie},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/gadenbuie/lorem, http://pkg.garrickadenbuie.com/lorem/}, }

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Quickly generate lorem ipsum placeholder text lorem::ipsum(). Easy integrate RMarkdown documents. Includes RStudio addin insert lorem ipsum current document.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: can install latest released version lorem CRAN current development version lorem GitHub r-universe
code: install.packages("lorem") # GitHub # install.packages("remotes") rmeotes::install_github("gadenbuie/lorem")  # R Universe install.packages('lorem', repos = c('https://gadenbuie.r-universe.dev', 'https://cloud.r-project.org'))

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: lorem includes simple addin RStudio adds placeholder lorem ipsum text current source document. addin allows specify number desired paragraphs sentences.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Another way generate lorem ipsum placeholder text call lorem::ipsum() inline R chunk R Markdown. Sit nunc convallis fringilla semper. Penatibus vivamus eget malesuada cursus fames magnis potenti. Venenatis ligula enim conubia laoreet orci, class ligula. Massa sem sed enim risus ut mattis inceptos nisl elementum mattis. Accumsan feugiat volutpat cubilia purus. Na purus. Elit venenatis tincidunt urna sagittis integer posuere dignissim. title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Generate lorem ipsum anywhere else using lorem::ipsum() lorem::ipsum_words(). purus enim pellentesque blandit facilisis elementum interdum suscipit enim urna urna elementum nec vitae scelerisque scelerisque faucibus dignissim urna interdum curabitur porttitor dui euismod
code: ipsum_items <- replicate(5, lorem::ipsum_words(5)) cat(paste("-", ipsum_items), sep = "\n")

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text
text: Thank Luke Haas node module getlorem providing lorem ipsum word list used package.

what: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text:
Renders ipsum() placeholder text HTML tags using htmltools::.tags(). default, paragraphs rendering

tags htmltools::p(), may provide paragraph wrapper function. general, need manually call function, instead can just drop ipsum() text another htmltools::tag().

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
code: # S3 method for lorem as.tags(x, wrapper = NULL, ...)

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text: x Object converted. wrapper function takes character string paragraph chunk placeholder text returns htmltools::tag(). default, lorem ipsum text wrapped htmltools::p(). ... additional parameters.

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem
text: Returns htmltools::tagList().

title: Render placeholder text as HTML tags — as.tags.lorem

htmltools::div( lorem::ipsum(paragraphs = 3) ) #>

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: Generates lorem ipsum placeholder text requested number sentences paragraphs. can control number sentences per paragraph average number words per sentence, simply enter number desired paragraphs completely random experience. lorem::ipsum() uses sampling random number generator makes effort shield placeholder text generation main script, please use package temporary placeholder text.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
code: ipsum(paragraphs = 1, sentences = NULL, avg_words_per_sentence = 10)  ipsum_words(n, collapse = TRUE)  ipsum_starts(n)

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: paragraphs Number paragraphs text generate. sentences Number sentences per paragraph. NULL, random number sentences per paragraph (approximately 3-8) chosen. Alternatively, sentences can vector integers representing number sentences per paragraph. avg_words_per_sentence Number expected words per sentence. n Number words generate collapse words collapsed single string, separated spaces (default)? FALSE, chosen words returned character vector.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: character vector lorem ispum placeholder text, element vector paragraph text.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: ipsum(): Generate paragraphs sentences lorem ipsum text. ipsum_words(): Generate lorem ipsum words, without punctuation. ipsum_starts(): Generate lorem ipsum starting words.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
text: can influence, degree, amount punctuation included output using lorem.punctuation_valence option. global option number 0 1, FALSE disable punctuation altogether. value closer 1, punctuation included sentences. value closer 0, less punctuation inserted. default value 0.4.

title: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — ipsum
code: # 1 paragraph of text lorem::ipsum(1) #> <lorem> #> Amet malesuada venenatis primis sed euismod, risus, sollicitudin #> porttitor urna sed? Scelerisque luctus tempor urna class proin ut #> interdum cubilia diam metus. Molestie facilisis nascetur primis rutrum, #> pharetra, facilisi tempus ad nullam leo commodo primis? Habitant #> facilisi tristique dis himenaeos interdum viverra, interdum lacinia, #> quis egestas. Justo hac rutrum metus turpis fermentum libero lectus #> quis vehicula lacinia dictum. Na dictum.  # 2 paragraphs with 2 and 3 sentences each lorem::ipsum(2, sentences = c(2, 3)) #> <lorem> #> Sit neque fermentum tempor interdum, mollis mus congue. Nisi vitae #> ornare lobortis pretium, tincidunt interdum varius class odio #> parturient ornare nostra? #>  #> Amet dapibus felis convallis: conubia tempus venenatis condimentum #> taciti! Nec turpis dis tellus: id proin, feugiat nibh imperdiet. Orci #> nisl venenatis ornare dis viverra massa ridiculus litora semper natoque #> justo tristique et dapibus?  # 2 paragraphs with short sentences lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 4) #> <lorem> #> Amet ad integer proin convallis sodales. Rhoncus aliquam nullam #> tristique hac proin id. Na id. #>  #> Amet potenti iaculis varius! Nam consequat parturient fames! Praesent #> netus torquent facilisi! Risus suscipit enim porttitor. Himenaeos #> libero est morbi euismod. Mollis viverra montes sollicitudin rhoncus. #> Eget varius inceptos, malesuada class. Na class!  # 2 paragraphs with long sentences lorem::ipsum(2, avg_words_per_sentence = 20) #> <lorem> #> Sit molestie urna nunc turpis placerat feugiat felis non velit fames #> inceptos. Iaculis lacus vulputate erat nibh cubilia nec at, sapien #> maecenas varius. Nisi libero dui, a montes semper nulla facilisi risus! #> Vulputate viverra malesuada in, arcu tristique leo imperdiet porttitor #> gravida est ultrices. Lobortis imperdiet auctor urna dignissim curae #> ornare cubilia? Pretium iaculis egestas cursus semper; condimentum #> himenaeos donec eros? Eros eget hendrerit nunc. Felis at lobortis nisl #> odio nisi imperdiet feugiat sociosqu venenatis faucibus erat nulla #> hendrerit accumsan lacus suscipit consequat donec metus tellus turpis #> ornare dictumst magnis tellus metus convallis volutpat sagittis #> habitant maecenas per pretium euismod feugiat leo vitae pellentesque, #> turpis varius luctus, ante, lobortis, tristique parturient, quis, et #> varius, ultricies euismod non praesent lacus: rhoncus enim id ultricies #> fusce, cursus etiam potenti fusce cras magna, scelerisque volutpat urna #> vestibulum ultrices ligula malesuada gravida tempus sollicitudin #> ultrices accumsan mattis sapien curabitur posuere ligula iaculis hac #> egestas risus aenean class dui dictum blandit fermentum! #>  #> Amet inceptos libero justo donec cum parturient, purus curabitur #> tincidunt. Sociis volutpat duis sodales maecenas parturient – laoreet #> dis, magnis gravida duis quam risus! Fames class neque cras #> sollicitudin praesent? Tortor nisl tellus imperdiet fusce ad, metus #> vehicula suspendisse eleifend neque! Laoreet habitant proin metus #> ultrices condimentum at tellus ad diam sem netus dapibus urna varius #> pulvinar augue faucibus tristique nibh cum semper rhoncus, aliquet – #> enim aliquet – sem, orci cursus urna cum blandit, quisque, sapien, #> vivamus suscipit gravida enim non aliquam: tempor a vel sociosqu odio, #> quam tortor est venenatis interdum inceptos porttitor pretium gravida #> interdum magnis platea porta.

what: lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — lorem-package
title: lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — lorem-package
text: Quickly generate lorem ipsum placeholder text. Easy integrate RMarkdown documents. Includes RStudio addin insert lorem ipsum current document.

title: lorem: Generate Lorem Ipsum Text — lorem-package
text: Maintainer: Garrick Aden-Buie garrick@adenbuie.com (ORCID)

title: lorem 1.0.0
text:
first official release lorem CRAN! small changes happened package since first released GitHub: lorem::ipsum() now returns lorem classed object works knitr R chunks htmltools tags. htmltools, paragraph automatically wrapped

tag, can call .tags() directly provide wrapper. change required ipsum() return list-like lorem class rather character vector; use format() .character() retrieve standard character vectors. Thanks @cpsievert suggestion (#7, #8). lorem::ipsum() now includes punctuation like commas, colons, semi-colons em dashes generated text (#4).
